name: 50f64a7a-a440-5809-9d6c-1fb307e637d4
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Puy de Dôme, France (20130101 - 20180101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Puy de Dôme, France (20130101 - 20180101)
